title: Bi-Weekly Music Discussion Thread
selftext:
What is r/India listening to? Share and discuss songs, playlists, artists, or anything music-related here!

If you're a musician yourself, please share your work so we can all hear what up-and-coming musicians are doing these days.

Don't just mention stuff, link it! Links that are official and provided by the artists themselves are preferred.

**Music Thread is posted every two weeks on Tuesday mornings |** [**Old Threads**](https://reddit.com/r/india/search?q=Bi-Weekly+Music+Discussion+Thread&restrict_sr=on&sort=new&t=all)

https://preview.redd.it/06d0xwq1x8n61.png?width=1487&format=png&auto=webp&s=4195dbb767ebd70a3209ea46a4497062e788c176
comments: Holy shit, it's so rare to come across Indians who listen to ambient. Eingya is easily one of the most emotional albums I have ever heard.
I know. Helios is top notch and my goto when I am working.

My three recos for the thread:  
  
'Stealing Dark from the Night Sky' by Arlo McKinley. Cute animated video for this country song.  
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6DsmF-ikwto  

'Milk (Joe Goddard Remix)' by Psymon Spine. I've heard the original, this remix is so much better.  
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=surnC_j21Ng&t=35s  
  
'Fleeting Future' by Akusmi. This electronica track starts off simple, but just keeps building and building from there.  
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Epg1LkSR7qk
